Articles.Content:
2 minutes ago, ZooNamedGames said:

Sorry  I'll revert in the morning if your on. 

You tried! I'm glad you even stopped to look so I can only enjoy the effort but point taken, if it doesn't quite fit a vision, try something else  .

I'm not great at designs anyways  I prefer to work on my own stuff for a while so I can do some stuff I want... if that's okay

12 hours ago, max_creative said:

And I have... Sand? 

Seriously, please build it away from my base if you're making one. 

Awww  fine. I could also break the sand....

11 hours ago, ZooNamedGames said:

Five things. Smallest announcements to largest. 

First off, The Hunting Reserve Lodge is ready for use. It has animals and should be (mostly) mobless during the daytime.

I'll visit it! Do you want an armor stand swapper? 

11 hours ago, ZooNamedGames said:

Secondly, if anyone makes written books of stories, instructions, etc (anything of note) should be given to me as I'm going to make a library here soon to encourage you to write this. 

Journey To Dres chapters!  

11 hours ago, ZooNamedGames said:

Third, development of the Grand Exchange for the economy system is partially built and is nearing completion. Thanks to a suggestion by @Dfthu, once construction of the spawn one and the library, there will then be a mini version in Paradise City. 

Fourth, if you would like to help create this Econ system (help is much desired AND appreciated!) let me know. Depending on your efforts there may be in game rewards.

I would like to help by make trading machines and currency exchanges. 

I also will put some similar machines inside the Creative. 

11 hours ago, ZooNamedGames said:

Fifth and lastly, due to @MK3424 being occasionally busy with life and @SparkyFox recently undergone heart surgery, that means I'll be the only moderator available, so expect to see me a lot more often in the following weeks. And no, I'm not considering new hands... yet. Not that I don't trust you, there are other reasons.

Ok. I really hope Sparky's ok and he comes back soon...  

4 hours ago, DarkOwl57 said:

Awww  fine. I could also break the sand.... 

I'm not complaining about you building an ocean base. I'm just complaining about you building it within render distance of my base. 

Speaking of render distance, wouldn't turning it down put less stress on the server and make it easier to break bedrock in the Creative? You saw nothing.

5 minutes ago, max_creative said:

Speaking of render distance, wouldn't turning it down put less stress on the server and make it easier to break bedrock in the Creative? You saw nothing.

Attention players:  Please do not obstruct or destroy the passageway leading out from paradise station towards the meadow area.  It is marked by torches.  It is one of the oldest structures in the paradise area, which i constructed to bypass a series of now-gone hills and small ponds to get out past them into the meadow area.  I have laid rail for a small loop leading out into the hills beyond.  Please do not obstruct or remove the rail.  I see someone is attempting to build some kind of large circular thing near the portal arch for the passageway and in doing so removing a bunch of rail for the cargo tram.  I re-routed the tracks around the disrupted area so it is once again a loop.

 

Please do not obstruct or remove extant built stuff without asking anyone unless it is something you built.  This is a group server with shared aspirations, so please keep in mind the spirit of cooperation which is so important for this neat experience to continue to do well and be a joy for all of us!

 

- Andy

Please do not obstruct or remove extant built stuff without asking anyone unless it is something you built.  This is a group server with shared aspirations, so please keep in mind the spirit of cooperation which is so important for this neat experience to continue to do well and be a joy for all of us!

I agree. Let's not mess with other people's stuff so we all can have a great time! 

Also @transitbiker sometime in the next month I will need a minecart track going to the Creative.

Hey, everyone I have an idea.

So, as you may know, the world has many monuments (The end fortresses, statues, the Sparkenon, etc.) and we are building more every day. I have come up with a royal palace, called Palace de Sparky. (If you can come up with any other good names, let me know.) It is mostly based off of the Taj Mahal, in India. It's going to be located behind the large hill at spawn. If anyone would like to help me, let me know and I'll let you know what's needed. 

Thanks,

Dark owl

(If you can come up with any other good names, let me know.) It is mostly based off of the Taj Mahal, in India. It's going to be located behind the large hill at spawn. If anyone would like to help me, let me know and I'll let you know what's needed.

I feel like we should try and stop building monuments... We have a lot already... And we should also make some for @MK3424 and @ZooNamedGames. 

But if you're going to build it anyway, why don't you call it the Taj Sparkal? Also, which hill? There's a lot of hills.
The one that aorlando's second house is on. And it's more of a castle than a monument.

I found ice spikes.  They are VERY FAR AWAY!.  My small little ice spike hut is located at X:9427 Z:8848.  Feel free to use the furnace & crafting stand if you need to!

 

Please don't damage the ice spikes.  Not only are they rare, but they sit right up against the ice plains biome boundary with a grassy area, it's like a glacier ending in a field. 

 

- Andy

3 minutes ago, transitbiker said:

I found ice spikes.  They are VERY FAR AWAY!.  My small little ice spike hut is located at X:9427 Z:8848.  Feel free to use the furnace & crafting stand if you need to!

Umm... There are ice spikes a lot closer... Go look at the map. I'm not posting it again. I've done that too many times... It's on one of the previous pages. Somewhere. 

4 minutes ago, transitbiker said:

Please don't damage the ice spikes.  Not only are they rare, but they sit right up against the ice plains biome boundary with a grassy area, it's like a glacier ending in a field. 

Ok.

On 11/26/2016 at 8:17 PM, max_creative said:

There's a map. Somewhere. I'll post it on discord or something. 

Edit: Map 

that ocean monument that's really close to spawn is mine. I'm going there today to build my base there. 

What are the different biomes?  Coordinates grid?

 

- Andy

Note please keep taller buildings further from spawn as every time they have to load in they eat up Mk's max data cap. But we do love to see them  ! Albeit the Taj Sparkal sounds rather pessimistic knowing the real Taj Mahal was built for a wife of a king who died. So it makes me think it's a gravestone and we don't know if he's gone or ok yet. Recovery takes 4-6 weeks. Been 1.

Also, @transitbiker, as awesome as exploring is, it bloats up the save size and we don't want to cripple Mk's CPU right guys?

Ok.  Just trying to stay out of people's way.  Sorry.

 

- Andy

r

Note please keep taller buildings further from spawn as every time they have to load in they eat up Mk's max data cap. But we do love to see them  ! Albeit the Taj Sparkal sounds rather pessimistic knowing the real Taj Mahal was built for a wife of a king who died. So it makes me think it's a gravestone and we don't know if he's gone or ok yet. Recovery takes 4-6 weeks. Been 1.

Recovery from what?

 

- Andy

The main reason i use existing stuff or make small lil shacks is because of the data issue.  I did not realize about the exploration being an additional issue.  I won't roam farther than my island unless permission to do so is given.  I have a lot of uncovered ground  closer to spawn that i've never seen anyways!

 

My ice spike hut has been de-housified aside from two wood pressure plates that i couldnt carry.

 

- Andy

1 hour ago, transitbiker said:

Ok.  Just trying to stay out of people's way.  Sorry.

 

- Andy

r

Recovery from what?

 

- Andy

Recovery from heart surgery he had on thanksgiving day. His heart was beating too fast so they ended up operating. We haven't heard from him since.

Server Announcement

Effective December 10th, the server will be undergoing some changes to adjust for  a few new systems we'll have in place. 

1st- The economy system will begin. It will work off of a barter system initially. As time goes on we may experiment by adding a currency but that's later on. 

2nd- To encourage use of the economy system and to get us back to playing the game normally, access to creative will be cut off to all players (except mods because of reason 3). 

3rd- Along with economy, there will now be jobs for members to take for income. (Forum Moderators Please Note No RP is occurring on this forum post and any posts attempting to will be reported immediately). Jobs can be anything from handyman doing tasks for players, firemen, A lumberjack and more. More information will be given on the Discord channel along with a Google doc I'll link there. 

4th- To those who donate to help @MK3424 (one hosting all this), will receive special perks. Poor guy'a burning up his internet bill for us, isn't that worth something?

Again, this isn't going to take place until then. Anything questions/concerns should be sent to me. 

In the meantime, have fun  !

Edited December 1, 2016 by ZooNamedGames

I have not used creative on here once, just for the record!

 

- Andy

Whomever modified my passageway, please change it back.  No one is supposed to change anything or remove anything without permission from the builder.  It also looks like it was obliterated by the base of a tall tower.  If you didn't get the memo, tall towers are being discouraged due to server load/data cap & lag.  Come on folks, we all gotta play by the same rules.

 

On a lighter note, my island i think is finally finished.  Just gotta stock up on all the essential items in the chests and do some final sorting.  Feel free to visit, but please do not take anything or touch/change anything.  Thanks!

 

- Andy
